nodes.text: Swamp buffalo were a species of swamp creature that were dangerous when gathered in large numbers. Several months after the Battle of Endor, the former Imperial Sinjir Rath Velus compared stormtroopers to swamp buffalo during an argument with the bounty hunter Jas Emari.
Swamp buffalo were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
